exercises.question: Translate to German: We cook for our father
Translate to German: He comes after his mother
Translate to German: You (formal) go to your father
Translate to German: I come with Ankit
Translate to German: I will come with my car
exercises.answer: ich werde mit meinem auto kommen

exercises.question: Translate to German: You must go for your sister
exercises.answer: sie müssen für ihre schwester gehen

exercises.question: Translate to German: She plays without her ball
Translate to German: We walk through the park
Translate to German: They sit at their grandmother’s house
Translate to German: He speaks with his teacher
Translate to German: I drive to my friend
Translate to German: She writes a letter for her brother
exercises.answer: sie schreibt einen brief für ihren bruder

exercises.question: Translate to German: We live near our school
Translate to German: They go without their books
Translate to German: He runs against the wall
Translate to German: I study since Monday
Translate to German: She works for her friend
Translate to German: We walk around the school
Translate to German: You (formal) come from the market
Translate to German: He drives out of the garage
